Breckenridge (Colorado).title: Breckenridge (Colorado)
Breckenridge (Colorado).byline: Breckenridge is a ski resort and town at the northern tip of the south central region of Colorado, in the Rocky Mountains of the United States of America.

Brecon.title: Brecon
Brecon.byline: Brecon (Welsh: Aberhonddu) is a market town and the former county town of Brecknockshire, a traditional county which now forms the southernmost part of the modern county of Powys in Mid Wales.

Brecon Beacons National Park.title: Brecon Beacons National Park
Brecon Beacons National Park.byline: The Brecon Beacons National Park (Welsh: Parc Cenedlaethol Bannau Brycheiniog) is a United Kingdom national park in southern Wales.

Breda.title: Breda
Breda.byline: Breda is a city of 180,000 people (2014) in the Dutch province of North Brabant.

Bregenz.title: Bregenz
Bregenz.byline: Bregenz is the capital of Vorarlberg in Austria at the Lake Constance.

Brejo da Madre de Deus.title: Brejo da Madre de Deus
Brejo da Madre de Deus.byline: Brejo da Madre de Deus is a city in Pernambuco Interior, Brazil.

Bremen.title: Bremen
Bremen.byline: The Free Hanseatic City of Bremen  is a city in northern Germany with a major port on the River Weser.

Bremerhaven.title: Bremerhaven
Bremerhaven.byline: Bremerhaven is a medium-sized town in the state of Bremen, on the outer Weser in northwestern Germany.

Bremerton.title: Bremerton
Bremerton.byline: Bremerton is located on the Kitsap Peninsula in the Puget Sound region of Washington state.

Brentwood (England).title: Brentwood (England)
Brentwood (England).byline: Brentwood is a large town, near Chelmsford in Essex.

Brescia.title: Brescia
Brescia.byline: Brescia is a rich industrial city in Lombardy between Lake Garda, Lake Iseo and the Valtrompia in the foothills of the Alps, about 100 km east of Milan, and the capital of the province of Brescia.

Brest (Belarus).title: Brest (Belarus)
Brest (Belarus).byline: Brest (Belarusian: Брэст; Russian: Брест) is a border town in the south-west corner of Belarus, near Terespol in Poland.

Brest (France).title: Brest (France)
Brest (France).byline: Brest is a city on the west Atlantic coast of France.

Brest Oblast.title: Brest Oblast
Brest Oblast.byline: Brest Oblast (Belarusian: Брэсцкая вобласць) is a region in the western part of Belarus.

Breteil.title: Breteil
Breteil.byline: Breteil is a commune in the department of Ille-et-Vilaine in Brittany.

Bretten.title: Bretten
Bretten.byline: Bretten is a town approximately 20 km north of Pforzheim in Baden-Württemberg, Germany.

Brewster (Massachusetts).title: Brewster (Massachusetts)
Brewster (Massachusetts).byline: Brewster is in Massachusetts on Cape Cod.

Breege-Juliusruh.title: Breege-Juliusruh
Breege-Juliusruh.byline: Breege is a village and municipality on the island of Rügen, generally known as Seebad Breege-Juliusruh.

Brewarrina.title: Brewarrina
Brewarrina.byline: Brewarrina is a small town with a population 1,651 in 2016 in Northwestern New South Wales.

Brezovica.title: Brezovica
Brezovica.byline: Brezovica is a skiing settlement in the Sharr Mountain National Park.

Brebes.title: Brebes
Brebes.byline: Brebes is a regency in Central Java.
